reviewCancellation(Object, ConnectionToClient) - Method in class server.ServerControl
Method(reviewCancellation) to extract the cancellation requests from the DB depends on the manager shop
ReviewCancellationGUIController - Class in clientGUI
ReviewCancellationGUIController class is responsible for allowing the shop manager to confirm a cancellation request sent by a customer and updating the balance of the customer if he is refunded upon to an order cancellation, the shop manager needs to select the order he wants to approve its cancellation and then clicking confirm cancellation button.
ReviewCancellationGUIController() - Constructor for class clientGUI.ReviewCancellationGUIController
 
ReviewOrdersGUIController - Class in clientGUI
ReviewOrdersGUIController class is responsible for allowing the shop manager to confirm an order made by a customer that belongs to his shop, he/she does that by selecting the order and then clicking confirm order button.
ReviewOrdersGUIController() - Constructor for class clientGUI.ReviewOrdersGUIController
 
ReviewOrdersOrderDetailsPOPUPController - Class in clientGUI
controller class for order details popup in review orders window
ReviewOrdersOrderDetailsPOPUPController() - Constructor for class clientGUI.ReviewOrdersOrderDetailsPOPUPController
 
reviewOrdersToConfirm(Object, ConnectionToClient) - Method in class server.ServerControl
Method(reviewOrdersToConfirm) extracts from DB the relevant orders that are waiting for manager to confirm
ReviewSurveyGUIController - Class in clientGUI
controller class for review survey window
ReviewSurveyGUIController() - Constructor for class clientGUI.ReviewSurveyGUIController
 
run() - Method in class server.AutoGenerateMonthlyReports
thread runs on the server and generates monthly reports
